overview: When a suicidal boy meets a purposeless girl.... something changes. To The Horizon is an offbeat High School Romance about how two people can effect each other in miraculous ways. How the bond between one misguided boy and girl can change everything about them and the people they know. From director Ryan Taylor and writer Alex Damle comes a tale of depression, escape, hope, and the power of love.
tagline: Not your typical High School Romance.
title: To The Horizon
